alert.note: Alert for Kodiak Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 17 at 4:10AM AKDT until March 17 at 8:00PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM AKDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches along the coast, with higher accumulations of up to 10 inches further inland. Northwest winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Kodiak Island. * WHEN...From 8 AM to 8 PM AKDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing snow due to the strong winds may reduce visibility to as low as one half mile at times during the late morning. Temperatures will warm into the lower to mid 30s at sea level which will lessen the blowing snow threat in the afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
